Crimes.Crime_Name: Marriage Fraud under Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of IAD's decision on marriage genuineness
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: IAD found credibility issues with applicant; assessment lacked record support
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage not genuine, entered primarily to obtain immigration status
Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Genuineness of marriage, credibility of parties
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Appeal before IAD, followed by judicial review
Crimes.Application_Factor: Timing of relationship events, financial interdependence, cohabitation
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Clarity, transparency, and factual accuracy of IAD reasons
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPR s.4(1) – invalid marriage for immigration purposes
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Decision set aside, remanded to IRB for reconsideration
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Suspected marriage of convenience for immigration benefit
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Inconsistent timelines, lack of corroboration, credibility gaps
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Applicant's testimony deemed inconsistent or implausible
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to reasonableness of IAD decision
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Lack of transparent and coherent reasoning

Crimes.Crime_Name: Work Permit Refusal under Immigration and Refugee Protection Regulations
Crimes.Legal_Issue: Reasonableness of IAD's decision regarding marriage genuineness affecting work permit eligibility
Crimes.Outcome: Sponsorship and associated work permit application refused
Crimes.Credibility_Assessment: Negative credibility finding based on flawed analysis
Crimes.Evidence_Type: Relationship evidence, communication records, travel history
Crimes.Basis_of_Claim: Marriage not genuine, intended to circumvent immigration rules
Crimes.Proceeding_Type: Appeal before IAD, followed by judicial review
Crimes.Application_Factor: Nature and duration of relationship, joint commitments
Crimes.Decision_Review_Issue: Logical connection between evidence and conclusions
Crimes.Governing_Rule_or_Provision: IRPR s.4(1) – invalid marriage for immigration purposes
Crimes.Outcome_of_Review: Decision set aside, remanded for reconsideration
Crimes.Cause_of_Refusal: Concerns about authenticity of marriage affecting sponsorship and work authorization
Crimes.Evidentiary_Issues: Ambiguous findings, timeline errors, lack of coherence
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Challenge to adequacy and logic of IAD reasons
Crimes.Relevant_Law: Immigration and Refugee Protection Act and Regulations
Crimes.Procedural_Issue: Ambiguous and irrelevant passages in decision
